- Let the patchwork: Leave the patch on for about 6-12 hours (or overnight) to allow the patch to absorb dirt and oil.
- Peel it off gently: After using it for the recommended time, peel off the patch carefully and apply a moisturizer or acne medication as needed.
- Acne patches will help protect acne from dirt and bacteria, helping acne to heal faster.

description:
BROWN LAB Dr. Dreamderm Spot Patch 18 pcs.

BROWN LAB acne patches are designed to effectively absorb acne and reduce inflammation. The patches work by absorbing oil, dirt, and pus from the acne head, causing acne to subside faster. It also helps protect acne from dirt and bacteria from outside.

- Cleanse your skin: Wash your face and pat it dry before using the patch to help the patch stick well.
- Choose the right size: Acne patches usually come in many sizes. Choose the size that fits the acne or area to be treated.
- Apply the patch to the acne: Gently peel the patch off the backing and apply it to the acne or area to be treated, making sure that the patch covers the entire acne.
- Let the patchwork: Leave the patch on for about 6-12 hours (or overnight) to allow the patch to absorb dirt and oil.

description:
BROWN LAB Dr. Dreamderm Spot Patch 18 pcs.

BROWN LAB acne patches are designed to effectively absorb acne and reduce inflammation. The patches work by absorbing oil, dirt, and pus from the acne head, causing acne to subside faster. It also helps protect acne from dirt and bacteria from outside.

- Cleanse your skin: Wash your face and pat it dry before using the patch to help the patch stick well.
- Choose the right size: Acne patches usually come in many sizes. Choose the size that fits the acne or area to be treated.

description:
BROWN LAB Dr. Dreamderm Spot Patch 18 pcs.

BROWN LAB acne patches are designed to effectively absorb acne and reduce inflammation. The patches work by absorbing oil, dirt, and pus from the acne head, causing acne to subside faster. It also helps protect acne from dirt and bacteria from outside.

- Cleanse your skin: Wash your face and pat it dry before using the patch to help the patch stick well.
- Choose the right size: Acne patches usually come in many sizes. Choose the size that fits the acne or area to be treated.
- Apply the patch to the acne: Gently peel the patch off the backing and apply it to the acne or area to be treated, making sure that the patch covers the entire acne.
- Let the patchwork: Leave the patch on for about 6-12 hours (or overnight) to allow the patch to absorb dirt and oil.
- Peel it off gently: After using it for the recommended time, peel off the patch carefully and apply a moisturizer or acne medication as needed.
- Acne patches will help protect acne from dirt and bacteria, helping acne to heal faster.
